Purpose: To quantitatively measure Insulin-Like Growth Factor-1 (IGF-1) in serum using mass spectrometry for accurate clinical assessment.
Container: Red-top tube (without gel separator) or serum separator tube (SST)
Equipment: Triple quadrupole LC-MS/MS mass spectrometer, high-performance liquid chromatography (HPLC) system, centrifuge, vortex mixer, sample preparation kit
